snippet.title: Polymega Gameplays - Pong [PlayStation - PAL]
snippet.description:
Known in the US as "Pong: The Next Level"

After years of game gulping cash left, right and center at the old arcade machine, Pong has returned in an all new 3D title on the PC. But it isn't just your simple Pong any more. Now you can play Jungle Pong, Football Pong, Ice Hockey Pong and 4 player Pong. All this plus 3D graphics. Not to mention animated Penguins (!?!?!).

Pong, Pong: The Next Level (C) Atari
Developed by Supersonic Software
BIOS Used: Polymega BIOS
Also released on PC, Macintosh and Game Boy Color

#retrogames #retrogaming #polymega #polymegagameplays #ps1 #psx #psone #playstation #theforeseenarcade #pong #pongthenextlevel #atari
